Pre-Game Insights: Analysts predict a Pirates win due to their comparative stability and recent performance.
The total is set at 8.5, with both OVER and UNDER at -114, indicating a tight contest expected by the bookmakers.
Adam Mazur steps to the mound with a record of 1-3 and a 7.49 ERA, which shows susceptibility to enabling hitters to get on the bases and cross the plate.
Bailey Falter of the Pirates has a more steady 7-7 record and an ERA of 4.45, giving the Pirates some hope due to his better control and fewer earned runs.
